issue.title: extra app

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=app.extra.android

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

||cdn.branch.io^
![Screenshot_20230102_143346_AdGuard](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118186787/210285813-2c0e5eeb-cf6f-4ad3-9935-6acff9782625.jpg)


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.youtube.com/?bp=wgUCEAE%3D](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%3Fbp%3DwgUCEAE%253D) ### Comment > After using Adguard For Windows for the first time, things were going good until several versions ago after an update, after that, I started having YouTube ads get through sometimes randomly about every day, and I was not the only one. > > Eventually, I reported it through the Adguard support page, Adguard Forums, and through the support option in Adguard For Windows, and I went back & forth with support trying to troubleshoot the issue. > > I tried uninstalling & reinstalling, updating, changing DNS between Adguard & Quad9, with & without security web browser extensions, et cetera, and the longest it worked without happening is maybe two or three days. > > Support had me send logs and advanced logs when ever this would happen, eventually I was told that it was a filter issue with Adguard, and that I would have to report it myself here; for some reason they could not send all the information I had already submitted themselves. > > I decided to uninstall Adguard & use Ublock Origin for a little while, I had no issues with that, eventually I decided to try Adguard For Windows again to see if the issue was still there, unfortunately it is. > > So I am finally reported it here like I already did through all other Aguard support methods. > > Adguard support did not tell me which filter(s) were the problem, I think I asked, but they did not answer; so you will have to ask them for those details, unfortunately I do not know the ticket number, I just know that my emails with that Adguard support has the subject AdGuard for Windows v7.11 – Bug report from last year. > > - Thank you ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/2XZLcqa.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/818cSd3.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.11.3 Browser: | Edge AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns9.quad9.net:443/dns-query`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/windows/filters/15.txt, User+rules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
EasyList,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist,
AdGuard URL Tracking,
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
NoCoin Filter List Userscripts: | https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-wot/1.0/wot.user.js Referrer: | [https://www.tubegalore.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.tubegalore.com%2F) Other extensions used: | LanguageTool, Video DownloadHelper, Windows Security set to Recommended Settings by DefenderUI.
